mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rn, inner_query.* FROM ( SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_created, notice_views FROM tbl_notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC ) inner_query WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT user_name AS userName, account_id AS accountId, email, phone_number AS phoneNumber, account_role AS accountRole, reg_date AS regDate FROM tbl_account WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
